Label: CT 104: Buyer of a 6-month European Call Option on a GOOG
Description: Buyer of a 6-month European Call Option on a GOOG Stock. Strike Price is USD 550.0 (today's observed price of the GOOG Stock is USD 526.4). Cash-Settlement at Option Execution date. Option pay-off calculation via CAPM based on a reference index scenario and with CAPM-alpha=0.02 and CAPM-beta=0.95.
